QuestData.Title: Fragile Values
QuestData.Description: It is now time to draw the Broodmother's attention. To do so, we will need a mallet that the troggs use when making offerings to her.$B$BSeek out the Stone Trogg Beast Tamers that are attempting to tame basilisks in the southern portions of the Pale Roost. You will find a mallet on one of their corpses.
QuestData.RewardText: Glorious.$B$BNow we will deal a blow to the stone dragons that they will remember for the next hundred years.
